div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die
februarij Anno quo supra

The samyne day the balyeis assignit monunday cum xv
dais to thomas mar to ansuer to the borghe' Strekit
one him be murtho glenmaluyn for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of vij li' g' Scottis to gude compt and rekning
for the hieris and wittalinge of the quartar of the barbora

the saide day the borghe' strekit be William philp apon
Androw peterkin for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
lij s' g' was fundin of nayn avale and the saide Androw quyt
of his challance and clame of the saide money

The saide day philp clerk was conuikit be ane assis' for
the wranguis' haldin of a wrang pek of les' mesour
and vnselit' Alsua he was conuikit for forstalling of the
burghe' for aplis vnyounis salt feggis rasynnis and al vthir
froitis or thai war present to the tone

the saide day george brone and Androw Wilson conuikit for
the haldin of ane wrang pek and vnselit Ande ale the
said' iij personis was ordanit be the consal to be putt
in the goyf thar' partis brokin and Ilkan to pay viij s'
for thar vnlaw vnforgevin

The saide day paule Cutlar' was conuikit for strubulance
of philp Dunbrek officiar' Ande gif euire he beis conuikit
eftiruarte for strubulance of ony officiar' in tym to Cum he salbe
expellit out of this tone

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die feb
ruarij Anno quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus lammyntone per confessionem proprie lingue
amerciatur quia non ordinatim exunt in processione in die purificacionis
vt moris est ad oblacionem

The samyn day Walter garache grantit him avand' to
Jonhne portar half ane thousand' yrne one the behalf of
William gareauche his brothir to be pait one the key of Abirdene
eftir the cumin of the Erast Schip out of flandris holand'
or Zeland' to the port of Abirdene the saide Jonhne payand the
fraucht of the samyn yrne

Eodem die Johannes lammyntone amerciatur per assisam ex ore Andree
branche quia non ordinatim exunt in processione in die puri
ficacionis ad oblacionem vt moris est

The said day the aldirman and ballieis assignit friday that next
cumis to the wif of Jonhne Waus of futy to bring hir preuis
to preyf the vale of hir' husbandis neth' and ordanit the officiaris to pas
with hir' and warne al personis that scho desiris to comper the saide day
to the preving' of the vaile of the saide neth'

The saide day the assis' ordanit Jonhe of lammyn
tone to bringe demi li' waxe to the haly blude licht
Ande Williame lammyntone to bringe demi li' waxe to
the saide licht for the brekin of common ordinance in the
inordinate passing one candilmes day to the offerand'
as vthiris thar nichtbouris passit Ande atour gif euire the saidez
Johnhe or Williame brekis commone ordinance in tyme to
Cum And' beis conuikit tharof Ilkane of tham beinge conuikit
sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
gif thai occupy the craft

The said day the aldirman chargit Jonhne lammyntone and Will
lammynton' to bringe j li' wax to the haly blud licht this day
viij dais vndir the pane of brekin of common' ordinance

The saide day Dauid Kintor grantit him avand' to Jonhne Wormet
ane barrell of Salmond' merchande gude to be pait at the next
mydsomir'

The saide day Robert Crage was quyt of the wranguis' haldin
of ane Siluer belt fra the wif of lindesay harrald' Ande quhat that
Scho cane lauchfullie preif that the said' belt was wortht or that
scho wil sueir' with ij personis of fame in hir hande he sal pay hir'

the saide day it was fundin be ane assis' Androw branche
forspekar of the saide assis' that the wif of lindesay harrald'
sal content and pay to Robert Crage vij s' and vj d' for viij quartaris
of Silkin burde bocht and resauit fra him

Eodem die murdaicus glenmaluyn tutor datiuus legittimus
et Indubitatus Johannis malison filij et heredis quondam Willelmi ma
lison burgensis eiusdem burgi fatebatur se gratant' recipisse et habuisse
nomine tutorio quo supra per manus prouidi viri Jacobi Colisone
summam quadraginta quinque librarum et Septemdecim denar
iorum vsualis monete Scocie in denariis et denariatis
et bona Jure hereditario eidem Johanni contingen' per decessum
parentum suorum que sequuntur videlicet ane mekile
pott and ane litill pott price xiij s' and iiij d' ane gus'
pane and ane vthir pane price four' s' ane boxe ane siluer
spvne and ane Siluer pece and ane primar buk price fiwe
markis ane half gallone ane quarte ane poynt ane
chopin ane muchkin ane pyssin pott ane plat ane
chargeour' ane dublar' tua dischis and ane trunschour'
price xxiiijor s' ane bassy ane lavir' ane chandlar a par
of pepir quernis sex s' and viij d' ane stane ane half
Stane weys and brede Sex s' and aucht d' Ane burde
clath and tua toualis four s' ane doublat of chamlat
and ane bygirdil price threttene s' and iiij d' ane Jak ane
Sallat gluffis and hernes price xxtj s' ane tayng' price tuelf
d' ane cussinge price tua s' thre pecis of paralinge thretten'
xiij s' and iiijor d' ane arras' bede price thretty fiwe s' the fadir
bed' boustar tua coddis Schetis tua blankatis and the standand'
bede price fourtj schillingis Ande for ane govne of airschip xl s'
Ane wair' staw and j schryne thre li' ane kist tene s' ane topburd'
tua markis ane burd and ane langsadil fiwe s' thre tour' tyngis
aucht s' ane brew caldron' and ane cuk xviij s' ane fate and a stande
iij s' Ane Ruff' of a bed' fiwe s' and ane cher' tua ballantis
ane part' ane eln' wand Ink stok v s' and ane croys'
pund' quequidam bona hereditaria appreciata fuerunt per honorabiles viros
Alexandrum Rede prepositum thomas prat Dauid prat et Willelmum andirsone
seniorem ad summam vigintj vnius librarum octo s' et octo d' vsualis
monete scocie in pecunariam solucionem et contentacionem omnium et singulorum bonorum
eidem Johanni hereditario iure contingen' per decessum dictorum parentum suorum
pertinen' aut quouismodo pertinere valen' de quibusquidam bonis et peccuniarum
summis iure hereditario et alias eidem Johanni contingen' nomine tutorio supra tenet
me vnde se content' et plenarie solut' ac eundem Jacobum heredes suos
executores et assignatos de vniuersis et singulis bonis ac peccuniarum summis eidem
Johanni hereditario iure et alias contingen' quibuscumque ac spectare valen' per decessum
parentum suorum pro dicto Johanne et se heredibus suis executoribus et assignatis ac pro
omnibus quorum interest quieteclamavit Imperpetuum omni pacto de ulterius non petend'
Insuper dictus murdaicus obligavit se heredes suos executores et assignatos fidemedia
per omnes terras ac possessiones fratres habit' et habend' ad conseruandum releuandum et pacifice
defendendum eundem Jacobum heredes suos executores ut assignatos liberos quietos
et Indempnes nunc et Imperpetuum de omnibus et singulis bonis et
peccuniarum summis prelibatis omnibus fraude et dolo semotis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem Octauo die
februarij Anno quo supra

Eodem die comparuit agnes Scrogis sponsa lindesay
harralde et asseruit ipsam fuisse in sasina et possessione
cuiusdam terre anterioris Jacentis in vico inferiore ecclesie in
coniuncta infeodacione cum dicto sponso suo Igitur reuocauit cassavit
pretensam sasinam de eadem aliis ut asseruit exhibitam Andree
goldsmitht' Johanni Steuart Waltero auchneyve et aliis
protestantibus Solempniter quod huiusmodi sais sasine exhibicio
non cedat sibi in preiudicium in postrum in vberiore forma
protestacionis

The saide day comperit Agnes scrogis the wyff of
lindesay harralde and refusit to sueir' the aithe that
scho was ordanit to suer' be ane suorne assis' of the
vale of the Siluer belt that scho follouit Robert Crage
fore sayand' scho walde nocht sueir' quhile scho war forthir
avisit

The samyne day the aldirman schew how that he hede
resauit our Souerane lordis lettres anent certan taxt
to be send' to the furnisinge of ane ambaxat to pas'
to the duk of burgunye for the gude of merchandice quhilkis
he present to the tone and certan taxtouris was chosin and suorne to
taxt and extent the part of the saide taxt pertening to this burghe
quhilkis taxtoris wald nocht extent the saide taxt that he micht kep
the day contenit in the said' lettres as he allegit herfor he protestit
quhat skathis happinis to Cum tharthrow suld' turne him to nay preiudice

The saide day Androw lammyngtone was in ane Amerciament of the
court be his avne tonge grawnt for the Inordinat passinge
to the offerand' one Candilmes day quharfor the said Androw was
ordanit be ane assis' Androw branche forspekar that to pay demi li'
of waxe to haly blud licht and gif euir he happinis to brak common'
ordinance in tyme to Cum and beis conuikit he sal pay xl s' vnfor
gevin to Sanct nicholes werk Alsua the aldirman chargit the
said' Androw to bring the said' demi li' wax one monunday that next
cumis to the haly blud licht vndir the pane of commone ordinance
breking'

The saide day Williame buchane of his avne will tuk
to ansuer perempturlie one monunday that next cumis to the borghe'
Strekit one him be Androw Culane Curat to Alexander Symsone sone
and ayr to vmquhil Dauid Symson' for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of the said' Dauidis best gone and for' wthir gudis of airschip
gevin in bill

The saide day Robert ewinsone come Souerte to the balyeis to Entir
Alexander Watsone befor thame within the tolbutht' one monunday cum xv
dais to ansuer' to the thingis that the saide Androw hede to say to him
And' to the thingis that the aldirman hede to say to him in the tovnis
nayme

The samyn day mege heruy the spous' of Jonhne Waus in futy deponit
be hir' aithe that scho wist nay nethis Strekit this yer apone
the pott wattir be hir husband' nor nayne vthiris nor wist nay persone
iniure hir said spous' hir self nor nay seruand' belangand' tham
nor was nocht iniurit be richerd ruthirfurd nor nay vthiris sen the passage
of the lordis out of the said' burghe'

the samyn day the balyeis assignit monunday cum xv dais
to Dauid Kintor to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him
be Jonhne malison for xliiij s' and vj d' for vthir money contenit
in the said' borghe
Curia balliuorum legalis tenta in pretorio xj die februarij anno quo supra

The said day the aldirman chargit androw lammyngtone
to bringe hame ane angell noblis waring' in lumbard'
Steile to Sanct nicholes werk in the erast Schipe cum
and' to Abirdene out of holand' zeland' or flandris one sanct
nicholes aventoure

The said day comperit agnes club with sere Alexander club hir
forspekar and follouit William Wormet for the wranguis'
spoliacion of ane par of clokis fra the said' Agnes quhilkis
the said' William be him Self and Robert blinsel and Williame
blinsel his prel'prel' overwrites 'proc'.ocutoris denyit the spoliacion and wranguis' avay
takin' of the said clokis And' in continent the said' action'
with consent of the said' partiis was put to the decisione
of thir personis vndir writin chosin in ane assis' that is to say
Androu branche Androw Culan yongar thomas mar William portar
Jonhne Steuinsone William andirsone eldar Syme gardin John
grige Jonhne chapman Androw murray yongar gilbert gareauche
Androw philpsone and Dauid' spens quhilkis riplie avisit
fand' the said' William quyt of the spoliacion and wrang
uis' takin of the said' clokis

the saide day Androw Culane curat to Alexander Symsone
sone and ayr to vmquhil Dauid Symsone one that ane
part Ande Williame buchane one that wthir parte ar oblist
and suorne the gret bodelie aithe to stand' at the decret
and deliuerance of thir personis vndir writin that is to say
William blinsel sere Jhone Stirueling Walter auch
neyve Duncan smitht and Jonhne grige anent al Airschip
pertening to the said Alexander and Anent the maile clamyt
be the said' Androw Ande anent j chaldir of lyme and ane
Schryne clamit be the said' William quhilkis personis sal deliuer
and furthtgyff' thar Sentence herapon be thar aithis
within fiftene dais hereftir follouing

The saide day the Aldirman Sett and to ferme leytt to
Jonhne of chamer the Sondais fische and the mettis
pertening to Sanct nicholes for this yer' siclik as he
hed' it obefor the said' Jonhne is oblist be his hand' landis
and gudis to content and pay to the aldirman or mastir of
Sanct nicholes werk thre barrelis of Salmond' tharof tua
barrelis at mydsommir next hereftir and j barrel at the lammes thareftir

The said day James Kintor and thomas fyff oblist tham
coniunctlie and Seueralie in the stratast Stile of obligacion Renunciand
ale benefice of diuisione be the fathis of thar bodiis to content
and pay ane barrel of Salmond sufficient merchande of the richtuis'
bynd' of Abirdene to thome menyes his ayris executouris or assignais at
mydsommir next hereftir or within xv dais thareftir at the farrast

The said day Alexander forbes fand' Alexander Richerd Craufurd'
Souerte to Entir him this day xv dais befor the aldirman
and ballieis within this tolbutht to ansuer perempturlie
as he will tyne and wyne to Robert Crage or his
procuratouris for ij barrelis meile restand' avand' him

Eodem die Robertus Crage fecit constituit et ordinauit
magistrum Johannes badenaghe' vicarium de gemry et malcolmum
Crage coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores ad prosequendum
Alexandrum forbes pro duabus barrellis farrine et in aliis placitis
et actionibus ipsum concernentibus promitten' de Rato et grato

The saide day the merchandis now hawand' gudis
in thar Schippis redy to saile with consent of the communite
present for the tyme grantit that euere persone hawand'
gudis within the saide Schipis sal bringe hame in
the samyn Schipis or vthiris sufficient Schipis to the tovne
for euere sek j tovne and demi of gudis hamvart for the
furnisinge of the towne with merchandis And' quha that
falyeis herintile sal pay wast fraucht for the said' j tovne
and demi siclik as the nichtbouris frauchtis the said Schip and xl s'
to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die februarij

The samyn day William buchane baxtar was conuikit be
ane assis' for the brekin of the pays' in bred bakinge
and for the bakin of ewill Stuffis
